problem:
set_option linter.unusedVariables false

-- 定义 Tree 数据类型
inductive Tree : Type
| leaf : Tree
| node (l : Tree) (v : Int) (r : Tree) : Tree

open Tree

-- 定义 tree_example2b
def treeExample2b : Tree :=
  node (node leaf 9 leaf) 100 (node leaf 8 leaf)

-- 定义 tree_example3b
def treeExample3b : Tree :=
  node treeExample2b 5 (node leaf 3 leaf)

-- 定义 tree_size 函数
def treeSize : Tree → Int
| leaf => 0
| node l v r => treeSize l + treeSize r + 1

-- 定义一个例子
theorem treeExample3bSize : treeSize treeExample3b = 5 := by
